Sub: Guldelines/ Norms for access permission to Fuel Stations, Private Properties; Rest Area Complexes and such other facilities along National Highways----- Corrigendum In continuation to Ministrys Circular of even number dated the July, 2013 on the subject  captioned above, the following Corrigendum is   issued in pursuance of Para 4 (Page 2) of this Circular:- Para 4, line) shall read as The Oil Companies/Owners of Private Properties & Rest Area Complexes shall engage registered Architects/Consultants, empanelled with the Ministry, in preparation of drawings/layouts of the proposed locations and other features of Fuel Stations, Private Properties, Rest Area Complexes ad such other facilities so that these are in conformity with the Norms_. The contents may please be brought to the notice of all the concerned in your Organization. This Circular issues with the approval of Secretary (RT&H) Yours faithfully, (Sharad Varshney) Superintending Engineer (S,R&T) (Roads) for Director General (RD) & Special Secretary 8+20 Imp / ( Nk mal2 1 Marg A4m Fe> Ring Sir, 24t1 (3r
